channel.title: Git on DataFibers
channel.description: Recent content in Git on DataFibers

item.title: GIT Tips
item.description: 1. Git Cheat Sheet 2. Check in Git Modified But Untracked Content Recently, I migrate this site to Hexo. I download the theme from github to the Hexo project folder. I also keep the source code in the github in case I lost the source code. However, when I run the git add . and git status. It shows error messages saying the theme folder is not tracked content. Most time, I did not check the git status - bad habit.
